cause.description:
lets just try not to damage them...they give us oxygen to breathe so why cut them down or pull of their branches!!...climb by all means they are the most interesting species to explore!! and once in a while why not plant one... AFFORESTATION! everyone loves trees they are so pretty and are the reason you are alive...so let us all praise the TREE!!
1. Trees are essential for the survival of wildlife
2. Deforrestation must end now
3. Save the rain forrest
cause.name: *SAVE~THE~TREES*
